body.p:
Louisville 22d Jany 62
His Excellency
Gov. Magoffin.

Allow me to solicit the favor of you to commission Samuel Russell of this city a Notary Public. He is a young man, Native of the soil, of good character & habits: is a licensed lawyer, and lives in my Office with me. It will be a great convenience to me, and confer an additional favor on

Jefferson Co
Notary
Saml. Russell
Iss' Jany 24. 1862
